scripts.start: cross-env NODE_PATH=./build NODE_ENV=development SERVER_CONFIG=./config/dev-config.json AWS_CONFIG=./config/aws-config.json nodemon --watch build --delay 3 ./build/server/src/cli.js
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_PATH=./build NODE_ENV=test SERVER_CONFIG=./config/test-config.json AWS_CONFIG=./config/aws-config.json mocha -t 10000 -r ./build/server/test/setup "./build/server/**/*.test.js"
scripts.test:wtfnode: cross-env NODE_PATH=./build NODE_ENV=test SERVER_CONFIG=./config/test-config.json AWS_CONFIG=./config/aws-config.json wtfnode ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -t 10000 -r ./build/server/test/setup "./build/server/**/*.test.js"
scripts.test:clean: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.prepackage: npm i && npm run clean:build && npm test && npm run build:prod
scripts.package: cross-env cpx ./docker/prod.dockerfile . && npm shrinkwrap && npm pack && rimraf ./prod.dockerfile ./npm-shrinkwrap.json ./dist && npm run build
scripts.upgrade-dep: ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm i && npm run test:clean
